text: Ta'oba sihamtara babe nahaya yihamte ajirana beya kama karae, arasesata sihamtara karaobara mrtyu upasthita ha’le si kaya, ‘ma'i etiya ta'oba karaicho’, arau sihamtara babe'o nahaya, yisakalara mrtyu kaphira arasthata haya. Ihamte'i se'isakala loka yisakalara babe ami kastadayaka sasti prastuta karai raakhicho
